name: Truth.
description:
Truth.

That special Truth can cost all of your life!

Try to find a truth inside a game code (In : Assembly-CSharp)! Be careful! Do not write answers in to comments because you gonna make game not funny and findy! Try not to use hints!

I prefer using dnSpy for best searching DLL. files! Once you find the truth do not write it in the comments! just say Yes or No!

And i dare you to find a code in a 5 minutes! And of course! Do not cheat!

Ok when i will be done with all these comments ? XD

P.S Did you knew if you click on that image TRUTH. in game you gonna see something?

DnSpy : https://www.softpedia.com/dyn-postdownload.php/5f3da28f9cc39b350b661e93532ea169/...

Have Fun!

I made this for my second gameJam entry!

Programs Used

MSpaint (Only for logo XD)

Unity (Game Engine)

MonoDevelop (Code Editor)
